title: Issues after android 11 update to pixel 4xl
content:
Below are the recurring issues after android 11 update.
1. Face id won't work and prompts to clean the top bar. Most of the time, it won't work even after restarting.
2. If a call is answered, screen goes full blank/black. We will not be able to unlock, reduce/increase volume, take screenshots, open other app, power button won't work. We cannot disconnected the call also. Very frustrating.
3. Unable to add emergency contacts (before update also)
